mapper.insert: insert into exam_title (title_id, qid, title_no, title_name) values (#{titleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{titleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{titleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select title_id, qid, title_no, title_name from exam_title
select title_id, qid, title_no, title_name,title_type from exam_title where qid=#{qid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by title_no
